entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rosetown Airport 09:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
